LanguageData.VFE_PortableWoodFiredGenerator.label: переносний генератор на дровах
LanguageData.VFE_PortableWoodFiredGenerator.descripti: Produces a small amount of power by consuming wood. Must be periodically loaded with wood fuel by hand. This generator is light enough to be carried around.
LanguageData.VFE_PortableWoodFiredGenerator_Frame.des: Produces a small amount of power by consuming wood. Must be periodically loaded with wood fuel by hand. This generator is light enough to be carried around.
LanguageData.VFE_PortableChemfuelPoweredGenerator.des: Produces a small amount of power by consuming chemfuel. Must be periodically refueled by hand. This generator is light enough to be carried around.
LanguageData.VFE_PortableChemfuelPoweredGenerator_Fra: Produces a small amount of power by consuming chemfuel. Must be periodically refueled by hand. This generator is light enough to be carried around.
LanguageData.VFE_IndustrialWoodFiredGenerator.label: промисловий генератор на дровах
LanguageData.VFE_IndustrialWoodFiredGenerator.descrip: Produces a large amount of power by consuming wood. Must be periodically loaded with wood fuel by hand.
LanguageData.VFE_IndustrialWoodFiredGenerator_Frame.d: Produces a large amount of power by consuming wood. Must be periodically loaded with wood fuel by hand.
LanguageData.VFE_IndustrialChemfuelPoweredGenerator.d: Produces a large amount of power by consuming chemfuel. Must be periodically refueled by hand.
LanguageData.VFE_IndustrialChemfuelPoweredGenerator_F: Produces a large amount of power by consuming chemfuel. Must be periodically refueled by hand.
LanguageData.VFE_TidalGenerator.label: приливний генератор
LanguageData.VFE_TidalGenerator.description: Produces electricity from moving masses of water, particularly tides. Must be placed on water.
LanguageData.VFE_TidalGenerator_Blueprint.label: tidal generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_TidalGenerator_Frame.label: tidal generator (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TidalGenerator_Frame.description: Produces electricity from moving masses of water, particularly tides. Must be placed on water.
